text: A partner shall not be a co-owner of partnership property and has no interest in partnership property which can be transferred, either voluntarily or involuntarily.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 41-155.1.

2001 Ed., § 33-105.01.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 501 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act). See Vol. 6, Part I , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-605.01

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Partner not co-owner of partnership property.
